simplesect.para: A vector representation of a 2048-bit unsigned integer as 4 x 512-bit integer fields.

simplesect.title: Detailed Description
simplesect.para:
A union of:
homogeneous aggregate of 2048-bit unsigned integer.
struct of:
4 x homogeneous aggregate of 512-bit unsigned integers.

formalpara.title: Note:
formalpara.para: Useful to access 512-bit blocks to pass to a 512x512-bit multiplies. These can be used as partial products in a larger 2048x2048-bit multiply.
This structure does not qualify for parameter passing in registers (more than 8 registers are required) and will be passed in memory.
